DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : PASADENA ; CALTECH TO CONTINUE MANAGEMENT OF JPL
DOC.TEXT: Caltech has signed a five-year contract to manage the Jet_Propulsion Laboratory , NASA ' s lead center for solar_system exploration . The contract includes roughly $ 1 billion annually for JPL operations . Also , Caltech receives a management fee of at least $ 6 million each year . The fee could increase to $ 18 million , depending_on Caltech ' s performance review from NASA . Caltech has managed the 7 # 300-employee laboratory since NASA ' s inception in 1958 .
